The Staff Was very nice and professionel...the receptionist ( the girl ) Was very welcoming and friendly ...we always Stay this hotel and we will defenatly going back..thank You to every person we met there

name: Hotel Lawerence Arabie
desc: Located just a 20-minute walk from Jemaa El Fna Square, Hotel Lawrence d‚ÄôArabie offers an outdoor swimming pool, caf√© terrace and traditional Moroccan d√©cor. On arrival, check was made so easy and the staff were amazing. The chef especially made our holiday. He went above and beyond to help us

name: Hotel Ibn Botuta
desc: Located in central Marrakech, this hotel is a 10-minute drive from the famous Jamaa El Fna square. It features an outdoor pool and a heated indoor one, a sauna, a fitness room . The hotel front desk staff Manager woman was the best friendly very informed assisted with our dinner and tour events!!! Helped put up my girlfriends hair exceeded all of our expectations made Marrakech memorable

name: ONOMO airport Casablamnce
desc: Situated in Casablanca, 34 km from Anfaplace Mall, ONOMO Airport Casablanca features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. Great hotel near to airport very clean

name: Hotel Suisse
desc: Situated on the famous Casablanca coast road, Hotel Suisse is a-30 minute drive from the airport and offers an outdoor swimming pool, terrace, barber shop and beauty salon, and as well as free Wi-Fi... The staff was friendly, the place is clean, the view was exceptional! I would recommend.

name: Idou Anfa Hotel & Spa
desc: Located in the heart of the business district, this 4-star hotel welcomes you in a very friendly atmosphere. Enjoy the personalised service as well as the high standing of the hotel. Very nice room. Central location. Great service and hospitality.

name: Hamilton Agadir
desc: Set within walking distance of Agadir‚Äôs fine sandy beaches, HAMILTON Agadir is set in beautiful gardens and features a swimming pool.
